question: A colourblind man marries a carrier woman. The percentage of their colourblind progeny in the next generation will be
explanation: Cross: XcY (Man) x XCXc (Woman). Offspring: XCXc (Carrier), XcXc (Colourblind), XCY (Normal), XcY (Colourblind). Two out of four (50%) are colourblind [cite: 110-115, 474].
